addons.name: Simple Translate
addons.description: Quickly translate selected or typed text on web pages. Supports Google Translate and DeepL API.
addons.fullDescription:
When you select text, the translation button pops up and the translation is displayed instantly.
If you enable "Do not display the button if translation is not required" option, you will not get frustrated by the button appearing when it is not necessary.

In the toolbar popup, translate the input text in real time.
If you enable "Automatically switch to the second language" option, you can do : When English is input, it is translated into Japanese, and when Japanese is input, it is translated into English.

You can also translate from the context menu.
You can select "Translate this page", "Translate selected text", and "Translate selected link" from the menu on the page or tab.

Supports Google Translate and DeepL API.

Chrome version: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/simple-translate/ibplnjkanclpjokhdolnendpplpjiace
Edge version: https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/cllnohpbfenopiakdcjmjcbaeapmkcdl

Ver 2.8.0

    Added system theme to theme settings
        Dark/light switches according to OS and browser theme.
    Supported dark theme for translation button
    Supported dark theme for translation panel
        Enable the Override default colors option to set custom colors.
    Added option to open page translations in the current tab
    Supports Arabic and Hebrew RTL
    Fixed an issue where the default translation language was not set correctly
    Fixed an issue where the width of toolbar popups had changed in Firefox
    Fixed an issue where error messages were not displayed on web pages


Ver 2.7.0

    Supported DeepL API
        You can use DeepL translations on Simple Translate by registering with the DeepL API.
    Added languages for Google Translate
    Fixed a problem that caused broken layouts on some pages
    Fixed minor errors


Ver 2.6.0

    Added the ability to import and export settings


Ver 2.5.0

    Changed to show recently used languages at the top of the drop-down list
    Added an option to disable translation in the code tag
    Added an option to disable translation by lang attribute
    Support for RTL in Arabic and Hebrew


Ver 2.4.0

    Added an option to select a theme (light/dark)
    Added an option to translate on modifier key pressed
    Fixed an issue with page translation not working
    Fixed an issue where keys were stored in the web page's local storage


Ver 2.3.0

    Added button to listen to pronunciation


Ver 2.2.0

    Fixed the issue that code was always inserted into web pages
    Added the option to disable translation in text field
    Changed the translation panel on the web page to be draggable


Ver 2.1.0

    Added button to enable / disable translation on page in toolbar popup
    Added option to disable translation on the page by specifying URL list
    Fixed problem that the error message is not displayed due to the translation API update
    Fixed problem that does not work properly on some pages


Ver 2.0.0

    Supported Google Chrome
    Usability improvement
        Implemented keyboard shortcuts
        Added copy button to toolbar popup
        Added link to open Google translate on error
    Added options
        Automatically switch to the second language on web page
        More flexible display position of translation button
        Display position of translation panel
        Font color on translation panel
        Display option page when updating
        Enable debug mode
    Fixed minor bugs
        Fixed problem that displayed as null when opening toolbar popup
        Fixed problem that could not get selected text in iframe when opening toolbar popup
        Fixed problem that could not translate some pages
        Improved accessibility of option page

addons.name: TWP - Translate Web Pages
addons.description:
Translate your page in real time using Google or Yandex.
It is not necessary to open new tabs.
Now works with the NoScript Extension.
addons.fullDescription:
What can this extension do?

    Your current page is translated without having to open new tabs.
    It is possible to change the translation language.
    You can select to automatically translate.
    To change the translation engine just touch the Google Translate icon. 

Why do you need to access your data on all the websites you visit?
To translate any website it is necessary to access and modify the text of the web pages. And the extension can only do that, with that permission.

How are the pages translated?
The pages are translated using the Google or Yandex translation engine (you choose).

And how's my privacy?
Privacy policy
We do not collect any information. However, to translate, the contents of the web pages will be sent to Google or Yandex servers.

Limitations
Some pages like support.mozilla.org and addons.mozilla.org will not be translated. For security reasons, the browser blocks extensions from accessing these sites.

How can I help you?

    Patreon
    GitHub
    Crowdin

screenshots.caption: Translate Web Pages - Desktop, Simple interface
Translate Web Pages - Desktop, Advanced interface

Use esta extensão para traduzir o Mozilla Firefox em inglês para o português. É a mesma tradução do Firefox pt-BR.

Use a extensão Locale Switcher para alternar entre os idiomas instalados. Para mais detalhes clique no link da homepage.

addons.description: Firefox Language Pack for Español (MX) (es-MX) – Spanish, Mexico
addons.fullDescription: If you can't see any change on the Firefox interface; open a new Tab and type "about:config" then find the "general.useragent.locale" property and change it's current value for this: "es-MX", restart Firefox and now you must see the Language Pack in action. Enjoy!

addons.name: MetaMask
addons.description: Ethereum Browser Extension
addons.fullDescription:
An Ethereum Wallet in your Browser
MetaMask is an extension for accessing Ethereum enabled distributed applications, or "Dapps" in your browser!

Watch an introductory video here.

The extension injects the Ethereum web3 API into every website's javascript context, so that dapps can read from the blockchain.

MetaMask also lets the user create and manage their own identities (via private keys, local client wallet and hardware wallets like Trezor™), so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the blockchain, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.

Because it adds functionality to the normal browser context, MetaMask requires the permission to read and write to any webpage. You can always "view the source" of MetaMask the way you do any Chrome extension, or view the source code on Github:
https://github.com/MetaMask/metamask-plugin

Enables access to:
Web 3.0
Dapps
NFTs
erc20
tokens
ICOs
erc721
NFTs
ERC 1155
...and more!

screenshots.caption: Log in to sites securely with an account you locally control!
Manage your accounts and their assets in a beautiful interface!

Paquete de idiomas para Mozilla Firefox en español de Chile (es-CL).

NOTA: Si después de instalar el paquete de idiomas, no ves ningún cambio en la interfaz; abre una pestaña nueva, introduce about:config en la barra de direcciones, pulsa el botón para entrar en la configuración avanzada, una vez ahí, busca la propiedad "general.useragent.locale" da doble clic sobre ella y cambia el valor actual por es-CL, reinicia Firefox y ya deberías ver los cambios.

addons.name: Firefox Multi-Account Containers
addons.description: Firefox Multi-Account Containers lets you keep parts of your online life separated into color-coded tabs. Cookies are separated by container, allowing you to use the web with multiple accounts and integrate Mozilla VPN for an extra layer of privacy.
addons.fullDescription:
About This Extension

The Firefox Multi-Account Containers extension lets you carve out a separate box for each of your online lives – no more opening a different browser just to check your work email!

Under the hood, it separates website storage into tab-specific Containers. Cookies downloaded by one Container are not available to other Containers. You can even integrate individual Containers with Mozilla VPN to protect your browsing and location. With the Firefox Multi-Account Containers extension, you can...

    Sign in to two different accounts on the same site (for example, you could sign in to work email and home email in two different Container tabs.
    Keep different kinds of browsing far away from each other (for example, you might use one Container tab for managing your Checking Account and a different Container tab for searching for new songs by your favorite band)
    Avoid leaving social-network footprints all over the web (for example, you could use a Container tab for signing in to a social network, and use a different tab for visiting online news sites, keeping your social identity separate from tracking scripts on news sites)
    Protect your browsing activity in individual Containers using Mozilla VPN, so you can shop while travelling abroad but check your bank account from a server in your home country.


After installing the Firefox Multi-Account Containers extension, click the Containers icon to edit your Containers. Change their colors, names, and icons. Long-click the new tab button to open a new Container tab.

For more information on how to use Multi-Account Containers, visit our help articles:


All about Multi Account Containers
Multi Container user - how to use Mozilla VPN
VPN subscriber - how to use Multi Account Containers

addons.name: Language: Aragonés (Aragonese)
addons.description: Firefox Language Pack for Aragonés (an) – Aragonese
addons.fullDescription:
(an)
Paquet d'idioma aragonés ta o Mozilla Firefox 9 u superior.
Punche aquí si precisa de paquetz d'idioma ta versions anteriors de Mozilla Firefox. Manimenos, se consella baixar dreitament o Firefox en aragonés dende Tamién puetz baixar Firefox dreitament en aragonés dende
https://www.mozilla.org/an/

Paquet d'idioma aragonés ta o Mozilla Firefox 9 u superior.
Punche aquí si precisa de paquetz d'idioma ta versions anteriors de
Mozilla Firefox.

Cómo instalar-lo
1. Comprebe que tiene instalada una versión de Firefox superior u igual a la 9.0.
2. Instale o paquet d'idioma aragonés d'ista pachina, u bien dende aquí si tiene una versión anterior.
En Ubuntu tamién puetz fer-lo dende Terminal:
$ sudo apt-get install firefox-locale-an
3. Instale o complemento Locale switcher dende aquí.
4. Reinicie Firefox.
5. En o menú de "Herramientas" u "Tools", cambie l'idioma en a opción "Language" u "Idioma" y trigue "Aragonés". Si no le salise a barra de menús en o cobalto, prete a tecla "Alt" y amaneixerán.
6. Torne a reiniciar quan lo pida o programa, y equiliquá!
7. Si a un caso no funcionase, prebe o siguient: en o navegador, en a barra d'adrezas, meta about:config y marque "Prometo que tendré cuidado" y meta:
general.useragent.locale "an"
intl.locale.matchOS false
8- Torne atra vegada ta o punto 6

Copyright (c) 2011-2013 Juan Pablo Martínez Cortés, Chesús Daniel Trigo Vilaseca, Daniel Martínez Cucalón and Softaragonés.

Licencias (MPL1.1/GPLv3+/LGPLv3+ Tri-licence):
* MPL : Mozilla Public License
version 1.1 -- http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html
* GPL : GNU General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html
* LGPL : GNU Lesser General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html

Son bienplegaus os informes d'errors y sucherencias sobre a localización. Por favor, ninvie as suyas sucherencias y comentarios ta l'adreza de correu-e softaragones(at)googlegroups(dot)com

Agradeiximientos: Gracias a Toni Hermoso, de Softcatalà por a suya graniza y chenerosa colaboración.

(en)
Aragonese Language Pack for Mozilla Firefox 9 or upper
Click here to find Aragonese language packs for previous versions of Mozilla Firefox. However, It is recommendable to download Mozilla Firefox directly in Aragonese, from https://www.mozilla.org/an/

How to install it
1. Check that you have Firefox intalled (version 9.0 or upper).
2. Install the Aragonese language pack from this page, or from here if you have an older version of Firefox.
In Ubuntu, you can also do it from a Terminal:
$ sudo apt-get install firefox-locale-an
3. Intall the Locale switcher add-on from here.
4. Restart Firefox.
5. In the "Tools" menu, go to "Language" and select "Aragonese". If the menu bar does not appear on the top, press "Alt" key and it will appear.
6. Restart Firefox when the software asks you to do it, and you're done!
7. If it still does not work, do the following: open the browser and write about:config in the address bar, then select "I will take care" and set:
general.useragent.locale "an"
intl.locale.matchOS false
8. Go back to step 6.
Copyright (c) 2011-2012 Juan Pablo Martínez Cortés, Chesús Daniel Trigo Vilaseca, Daniel Martínez Cucalón and Softaragonés.

Licences (MPL1.1/GPLv3+/LGPLv3+ Tri-licence):
* MPL : Mozilla Public License
version 1.1 -- http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html
* GPL : GNU General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html
* LGPL : GNU Lesser General Public License
version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html

Any suggestions or feedback about the spelling dictionary are welcome. Please send your suggestions, error reports and/or missing words to softaragones(at)googlegroups(dot)com

Acknowledgements: Thanks to Toni Hermoso, from Softcatalà, for his enourmous and generous support.

addons.name: Language: Ligure (Ligurian)
addons.description: Firefox Language Pack for Ligure (lij) – Ligurian
addons.fullDescription:
(ZEN)
Con sto plug-in se peu adeuviâ o Firefox in zeneize!
Firefox in zeneize o l'é scrito inta grafia ofiçiâ

Pe adeuvialo dovei segoî i segoenti passi:

1) Instalâ sto plugin
2) Inta bara di indirissi, scrive about:config e sciacca Invio.
3) Sciacca in sce "accetto i rischi!" pe anâ a-a pagina about:config.
4) Scrivi intl.locale.requested into canpo de riçerca.
5) Sciacca 2 vòtte in sciô intl.locale.requested, se o gh'é, ò azonzilo comme neuva preferensa pöi scrivi lij comme valô.

--Vixita o nòstro scito: http://firefoxzeneize.altervista.org/
( p.s.!!! òua gh'é a verscion conpleta chi: http://www.mozilla.org/lij/firefox/fx/ )
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(ITA)
Con questo plug-in si può usare Firefox in genovese!!
Firefox in zenéize é scritto in grafia ufficiale

Per utilizzarlo dovete seguire i seguenti passi:

1) Installare questo plugin
2) Nella barra degli indirizzi, scrivere about:config e premi Invio.
3) Clicca su "accetto il rischio!" per andare alla pagina about:config.
4) Scrivi intl.locale.requested nel campo di ricerca.
5) Clicca 2 volte su intl.locale.requested, se c'é, o aggiungilo come nuova preferenza poi scrivi lij come valore.

--Visita il nostro sito: http://firefoxzeneize.altervista.org/
( p.s.!!! ora c'é la versione conpleta qui: http://www.mozilla.org/lij/firefox/fx/ )
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(ENG)
Thanks to this plug-in you can use Firefox in Ligurian(genoese)!!
Firefox in zenéize is written with the official orthography

To activate the plugin you must follow this steps:

1) Install this plugin
2) In the address bar, type about:config and press Enter.
3) Click I accept the risk! to continue to the about:config page.
4) Type intl.locale.requested in the Search field.
5) Double-click the intl.locale.requested preference, if found, or add it as a new preference and write lij

--Visit our website: http://firefoxzeneize.altervista.org/
( p.s.!!! now there is the complete version here: http://www.mozilla.org/lij/firefox/fx/ )
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

addons.name: Language: Català (Valencià)
addons.description: Firefox Language Pack for Català (Valencià) (ca-valencia) – Catalan, Valencian
addons.fullDescription:
This addon enables Firefox interface in Valencian Catalan variant.

Compared to the generic version, Valencian genuine forms are prioritized and own accentuation system is preferred. Recommendations from AVL, the normative entity which regulates Valencian in the Valencian territory according to the Statute of Autonomy, are followed.

The easier way to use it is following the instructions from here (in Valencian).

Alternately, in order to install this, please have Simple Locale Switcher extension enabled before and choose "Catalan (valencia)" in the languages section of the add-on manager.

addons.name: Profile Switcher for Firefox
addons.description: Create, manage and switch between browser profiles seamlessly.
addons.fullDescription:
Features:

    Create, edit, delete and change your default browser profile
    Switch between profiles in the toolbar
    Choose from a variety of different profile pictures


Additional software is required for this extension to function, you will be prompted to install it after installing the extension.

Source code: https://github.com/null-dev/firefox-profile-switcher

addons.name: Automa
addons.description: An extension for automating your browser by connecting blocks
addons.fullDescription:
From auto-fill forms, doing a repetitive task, taking a screenshot, to scraping data from a website, it's up to you what you want to do with this extension. And you also can schedule when the automation will execute.

If you have a question or want to report a bug, feel free to open an issue in the automa GitHub repository.

Github: https://github.com/kholid060/automa
